content: Examples of keywords are the primitive types, int and boolean; the control flow statements for and if; access modifiers such as public, and special words which mark the declaration and definition of Java classes, packages, and interfaces: class, package, interface.
stemmed: exampl keyword primit type , int boolean ; control flow statement ; access modifi public , special word mark declar definit java class , packag , interfac : class , packag , interfac .
